sources.styles/core/variables.sass:
@font-face
  font-family: "Avenir-Black"
  font-weight: normal
  font-style: normal

  src: url("../fonts/Avenir-Black.woff") format("woff"),
  src: url("../fonts/Avenir-Black.woff2") format("woff")

@font-face
  font-family: "Avenir-Medium"
  font-weight: normal
  font-style: normal

  src: url("../fonts/Avenir-Medium.woff") format("woff"),
  src: url("../fonts/Avenir-Medium.woff2") format("woff")

@font-face
  font-family: "Avenir-Roman"
  font-weight: normal
  font-style: normal

  src: url("../fonts/Avenir-Roman.woff") format("woff"),
  src: url("../fonts/Avenir-Roman.woff2") format("woff")

// Color
$color-main: #9AA3B0
$color-main--light: lighten($color-main, 10%)
$color-main--dark: darken($color-main, 10%)
$color-grey: #9AA3B0

$color-selection: $color-main
$scrollbar-color: $color-main

$color-header: #08153A
$color-body: #08153A
$color-border: rgba(182, 182, 182, 0.4)

// Type
$font-header: "Avenir-black", Arial, Sans-Serif
$font-body: "Avenir-Roman", Arial, Sans-Serif

// Animation
$transition1: 0.28s all ease
sources.styles/core/globals.sass:
*
  -webkit-box-sizing: border-box
  -moz-box-sizing: border-box
  box-sizing: border-box

html
  font-size: 62.5%

  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale

body
  margin: 0

::selection
  color: #fff
  background: $color-selection

::-webkit-scrollbar
  width: 5px

  background: #f6f6f6

::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb
  background-color: $scrollbar-color

// img reset
img
  max-width: 100%
  height: auto

// basic hr
hr,
.hr
  display: block

  height: 0.1rem
  margin: 0
  padding: 0

  border: 0
  background: $color-border

// wrapper
.wrapper
  max-width: 1000px
  margin: 0 auto
  padding: 30px

figure
  margin: 0

.mannenman
  height: 800px

.logo
  display: block

  height: 30px
  margin-bottom: 10px

body
  overflow: hidden

  max-width: 100vw
  max-height: 100vh

main
  display: flex
  align-items: center
  justify-content: center

  width: 100vw
  height: 100vh

.btn
  display: block

  padding: 11px 18px

  cursor: pointer
  transition: .3s ease all
  letter-spacing: 0.5px
  text-transform: uppercase

  color: rgba(#08153A, 0.9)
  border: none
  background: #D8DFEB

  font-family: "Avenir-Medium", Arial, Sans-Serif

  &:hover
    transform: scale(1.1)

.content
  .btn
    margin-bottom: 4.3rem

  h3
    margin-top: 2rem

.actions
  display: flex

.action
  display: flex
  align-items: center
  justify-content: center

  width: 3.1rem
  height: 3.1rem
  margin: 0
  margin-right: 10px
  padding: 0

  transition: .3s all ease

  color: $color-grey
  border: 1px solid $color-grey
  border-radius: 50%
  box-shadow: none

  font-family: "Avenir-Medium", Arial, Sans-Serif
  font-size: 1.4rem

  &:hover
    cursor: pointer
    transform: scale(1.1)

    color: #000
    background: #fff
    box-shadow: 0 1px 20px rgba(#9CA7BC, .3)

  &:last-child
    margin-right: 0

.action--active
  margin-right: 15px

  transform: scale(1.3)

  color: #000
  border-width: 0
  background: #fff
  box-shadow: 0 1px 20px rgba(#9CA7BC, .3)

.capture-pose
  position: fixed

.pose-select
  position: fixed
  top: 50%
  left: 550px

  display: flex

  transform: translateY(100%) scaleX(0.9)

  .row
    display: flex
    align-items: center
    flex-direction: column

  img
    height: 180px
    margin: 20px

    cursor: pointer
    transition: .3s all ease

    &:hover
      transform: scale(1.1)

#shadow
  position: fixed
  z-index: -1
  top: 82%
  left: 49%

  width: 248px
  height: 70px

  opacity: .14
  border-radius: 50%
  background: #08153A

  filter: blur(14px)
sources.styles/core/type.sass:
body
  color: $color-body

  font-family: $font-body
  font-size: 1.58rem
  font-weight: 400
  line-height: 1.6

h1,
h2,
h3,
h4,
h5,
h6,
th
  display: inline-block

  margin: 0 0 0.3em 0

  color: #08153A

  font-family: $font-header
  font-weight: 400
  line-height: 1.18

h1,
.h1
  font-size: 3.16rem

h2,
.h2
  font-size: 4.8rem

h3,
.h3
  color: $color-grey

  font-family: "Avenir-Roman", Arial, Sans-Serif
  font-size: 1.83rem

h4,
.h4
  font-size: 2.7rem

h5,
.h5
  font-size: 2.2rem

h6,
.h6
  font-size: 2rem

p,
.p
  max-width: 750px
  margin: 0 0 1em 0

  &:last-child
    margin-bottom: 0

a
  transition: $transition1
  text-decoration: none

  color: initial
